objective_title: Help Prichard Utilities implement targeted reforms to eliminate sewage spills and ensure wastewater discharge is compliant (safe waters for swimming).
kr_description: Achieve an annual reduction of 0.5 million gallons in the volume of sewage spills by 2027.

objective_title: Help Prichard Utilities implement targeted reforms to eliminate sewage spills and ensure wastewater discharge is compliant (safe waters for swimming).
kr_description: Assist Prichard in securing $10 million in necessary funding by 2027 for critical infrastructure upgrades focused on preventing future spills.

objective_title: Help Prichard Utilities implement targeted reforms to eliminate sewage spills and ensure wastewater discharge is compliant (safe waters for swimming).
kr_title: Outfall bacteria within permit limits (monitoring window)
kr_description: Baykeeper outfall monitoring shows bacteria levels within permit limits during all sampling events from 2025-06-01 to 2026-06-01.
